snippet.title: The Man in the Fields - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
🕹️ Get The Man in the Fields on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3051180?utm_source=youtube

🕹️ Get The Man in the Fields on Itch: https://ravineinteractive.itch.io/the-man-in-the-fields

The Man in the Fields is a first person horror experience based on a ritual of the same name. Once you summon The Man in the Fields, every door and item in your house will be opened. Close everything in time to prevent it from getting in.
